column2: Bloodmage Union is a loose conglomeration of mages banished from the traditional magic school for their study of haemomana. Though no official body exists for the study of blood magic, ambitious and curious bloodmages may seek out the help of others, even Vampires.
The Haemomagister is the defacto leader of the loosely affiliated bloodmages either by virtue of their power or knowledge.
